entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 8:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
